Articles.Content:
This may be an unrealistic idea but ive always wanted a major revamp of minmus, first there could be a breathable atmosphere that stops at a 1500m from sea level? Second there could be salt lakes in the salt flats of minmus, 100 meters deep but extremely buoyant. Third there could be a thin ring orbiting it at a 45 degree inclination and finally, a moon half the size of gilly, but twice as dense as minmus mabye?

heck call the sub-moon minminmus

There probably is a mod but yeah that would be very cool especially as it is one of the most plain planets/moons even with the special structures in breaking ground dlc.

Also stock game this isn’t happening since the last major update came out so it’s very unlikely they will do something along these lines for even other planets

If there is a mod you’d have to wait / check if it is compatible with 1.12 or see if it is compatible with breaking ground dlc since I know a lot of planet revamp mods aren’t.
